title: Mordekaiser rework
body: plzz riot nerf morekaiser next patch he is way to much 1 kill and almost oneshots everything he got is way to strong a pull that is so far hiq q that crits way to much and then a shield that heals him every few sec.? even if you can kill him he just ults!????{{champion:82}}

replies.body: He was announced to receive nerfs next patch.

plzz riot nerf temo next patch he is way to much 1 kill and almost oneshots everything he got is way to strong a dart that is so far hiq q that blinds way to much and then move speed boost that speeds him every few sec.? even if you can kill him he just goes invisible!????{{champion:17}}
